channel.title: Latest News on Entwine Centre
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on Entwine Centre

item.title: IoT malware on the rise
item.description: IoT malware on the rise According to recent analysis by secure cloud company Zscaler, there has been a fivefold increase in IoT malware attacks since 2022.

item.title: WebAssembly and IoT
item.description: WebAssembly and IoT According to a recent survey commissioned by the Linux Foundation, IoT applications were the third most popular “use case” for WebAssembly (behind the web and data visualisation).

item.title: RIoT OS Anniversary
item.description: 10th Anniversary of RIoT OS The RIoT OS is one of the many choices of operating system available for the kinds of embedded processors used in IoT devices.

item.title: MCU with Wi-Fi
item.description: Microcontroller board with Wi-Fi The Raspberry Pi Foundation launched the Raspberry Pi nano W this month.

item.title: List of Entwine Projects
item.description: Project webpages now live We’ve added a list of research projects involving Entwine personnel to the website here.

item.title: Entwine membership growth
item.description: From Baseball to Football! When we established Entwine a few years ago, the number of academics involved would be enough to form a baseball team.

item.title: New website launches today
item.description: Hello Everyone! The new Entwine website has just been launched. There won’t be many blog posts here at launch, but stay tuned!

item.title: Legacy website
item.description: Farewell old website! The old website is still accessible here at the time of posting but eventually will redirect to our new home, and those pages will be gone forever…
